short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Save a complete page into a single HTML file
short.de: Speichern einer kompletten Webseite in eine einzige HTML-Datei
short.es: Guarda una página completa en un único archivo HTML
short.fr: Sauvegardez une page complète dans un simple fichier HTML
short.it: Salva una pagina completa in un singolo file HTML
short.ja: 完全なページを単一の HTML ファイルに保存する
short.pl: Zapisuj kompletną stronę w pojedynczym pliku HTML.
short.pt_BR: Salvar página inteira num único arquivo HTML
short.pt_PT: Guardar uma página completa num único ficheiro HTML
short.ru: Сохранение полной страницы в едином HTML-файле
short.tr: Tam bir sayfayı tek bir HTML dosyasına kaydet
short.uk: Зберегти всю сторінку в один HTML-файл
short.zh_CN: 将一个完整的页面保存到单个 HTML 文件中
short.zh_TW: 將一個完整的頁面保存到單個 HTML 文件中

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
SingleFile is an extension that helps you to save a complete page (with CSS, images, fonts, frames, etc.) as a single HTML file.

Getting started
 - Wait until the page is fully loaded.
 - Click on the SingleFile button in the extension toolbar to process and save the page.
 - You can click again on the button to cancel the action when processing a page.

Additional notes
 - Open the context menu by right-clicking the SingleFile button in the extension toolbar or on the webpage. It allows you to save:
   - the current tab,
   - the selected content,
   - the selected frame,
   - the selected link(s).
 - Select "Annotate and save the page..." in the context menu to:
   - Highlight text,
   - add notes,
   - remove content.
 - You can also process multiple tabs in one click and save:
   - the selected tabs,
   - the unpinned tabs,
   - all the tabs.
 - The context menu also allows you to activate the auto-save (after pages are being loaded) of:
   - the current tab,
   - the unpinned tabs,
   - all the tabs.
 - Right-click on the SingleFile button and select "Manage extension" to open the options page.
 - Upload pages to Google Drive/Dropbox/GitHub/WebDAV via the Destination section in the options page.
 - Enable the option "Misc. > add proof of existence" to prove the existence of saved pages by linking the SHA256 of the pages into the blockchain.
 - You can use the customizable shortcut Ctrl+Shift+Y to save the current tab or selected tabs.
 - And more!

More info
 - FAQ: https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/SingleFile/blob/master/faq.md
 - Known issues: https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/SingleFile#known-issues

See the extension help in the options page for more detailed information about the options.
Project on GitHub: https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/SingleFile

Suggestions are welcome :)
long.de,es,fr,ja,pl,ru,uk,zh_CN,zh_TW:
SingleFile is an extension that helps you to save a complete page (with CSS, images, fonts, frames, etc.) as a single HTML file.

Getting started
 - Wait until the page is fully loaded.
 - Click on the SingleFile button in the extension toolbar to process and save the page.
 - You can click again on the button to cancel the action when processing a page.

Additional notes
 - Open the context menu by right-clicking the SingleFile button in the extension toolbar or on the webpage. It allows you to save:
   - the current tab,
   - the selected content,
   - the selected frame,
   - the selected link(s).
 - Select "Annotate and save the page..." in the context menu to:
   - Highlight text,
   - add notes,
   - remove content.
 - You can also process multiple tabs in one click and save:
   - the selected tabs,
   - the unpinned tabs,
   - all the tabs.
 - The context menu also allows you to activate the auto-save (after pages are being loaded) of:
   - the current tab,
   - the unpinned tabs,
   - all the tabs.
 - Right-click on the SingleFile button and select "Manage extension" to open the options page.
 - Enable the option "Misc. > save to Google Drive" to upload pages to Google Drive.
 - Enable the option "Misc. > add proof of existence" to prove the existence of saved pages by linking the SHA256 of the pages into the blockchain.
 - You can use the customizable shortkey Ctrl+Shift+Y to save the current tab or selected tabs.
 - And more!

More info
 - FAQ: https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/SingleFile/blob/master/faq.md
 - Known issues: https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/SingleFile#known-issues

See the extension help in the options page for more detailed information about the options.
Project on GitHub: https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/SingleFile

Suggestions are welcome :)
long.it,tr:
SingleFile is an extension that helps you to save a complete page (with CSS, images, fonts, frames, etc.) as a single HTML file.

Getting started
 - Wait until the page is fully loaded.
 - Click on the SingleFile button in the extension toolbar to process and save the page.
 - You can click again on the button to cancel the action when processing a page.

Additional notes
 - Open the context menu by right-clicking the SingleFile button in the extension toolbar or on the webpage. It allows you to save:
   - the current tab,
   - the selected content,
   - the selected frame,
   - the selected link(s).
 - Select "Annotate and save the page..." in the context menu to:
   - Highlight text,
   - add notes,
   - remove content.
 - You can also process multiple tabs in one click and save:
   - the selected tabs,
   - the unpinned tabs,
   - all the tabs.
 - The context menu also allows you to activate the auto-save (after pages are being loaded) of:
   - the current tab,
   - the unpinned tabs,
   - all the tabs.
 - Right-click on the SingleFile button and select "Manage extension" to open the options page.
 - Enable the option "Destination > save to Google Drive", or "Destination > save to GitHub"  to upload pages to Google Drive or GitHub respectively.
 - Enable the option "Misc. > add proof of existence" to prove the existence of saved pages by linking the SHA256 of the pages into the blockchain.
 - You can use the customizable shortkey Ctrl+Shift+Y to save the current tab or selected tabs.
 - And more!

More info
 - FAQ: https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/SingleFile/blob/master/faq.md
 - Known issues: https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/SingleFile#known-issues

See the extension help in the options page for more detailed information about the options.
Project on GitHub: https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/SingleFile

Suggestions are welcome :)
long.pt_BR,pt_PT:
SingleFile é uma extensão para Firefox Desktop e Mobile que ajuda você a salvar um site inteiro incluindo imagens, estilos, frames, fontes, etc. num único arquivo HTML.

Guia de introdução
    - Aguarde até que o site esteja totalmente carregado
    - Clique no botão SingleFile na barra de ferramentas da extensão para processar e salvar o site
    - Também ao processar o site, pode clicar uma vez mais no botão para cancelar a ação

Demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oVvTmcwxvmc

Informações adicionais
    Abra o menu de contexto clicando com o botão direito do mouse no SingleFile na barra de ferramentas da extensão ou no site. Isso permite salvar:
        - a aba atual,
        - o conteúdo selecionado,
        - o frame selecionado,
        - o(s) link(s) selecionado(s).


Selecione "Anotar e salvar o site..." no menu de contexto para:
    - Destacar texto,
    - adicionar anotações,
    - remover conteúdo.

Você também pode processar várias abas em um clique e salvar:
    - abas selecionadas,
    - abas não fixadas,
    - todas abas.

O menu de contexto também permite ativar a opção para salvar automaticamente (após sites foram carregados):
    - a aba atual,
    - abas não fixadas,
    - todas abas.

Clique com o botão direito do mouse no SingleFile e selecione "Gerenciar extensão" para abrir opções.
Ative a opção "Destino > salvar ao Google Drive" para enviar sites ao Google Drive.
Ative a opção "Destino > salvar ao Github" para enviar sites ao Github.
Ative a opção "Diversos > adicionar prova de existência" para provar a existência de sites salvos, vinculando o hash SHA256 de sites ao blockchain.
    Você pode usar tecla de atalho personalizável Ctrl+Shift+Y para salvar a aba atual ou abas selecionadas.
    E mais!

Mais detalhes
FAQ: https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/SingleFile/blob/master/faq.md
Problemas conhecidos: https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/SingleFile#known-issues

Visite o site de ajuda da extensão em opções para obter informações mais detalhadas sobre as opções.
Projeto no GitHub: https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/SingleFile

Sugestões são bem-vindas :)

Comentário do desenvolvedor

Por favor, siga estes passos se você encontrar um problema:
- Faz um reset de opções no SingleFile.
- Se o reset de opções não resolveu o problema, reinicie navegador.
- Se o reinicio de navegador não consertou o problema, tente desativar todas as outras extensões para ver se há um conflito.
- Se houver um conflito, tente determinar com quais extensões.
- Por favor relate o problema com uma breve descrição explicando como reproduzi-lo aqui: https://github.com/gildas-lormeau/SingleFile/issues.
